message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $13,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I believe this product offers you even greater value than your proposed price reflects. How about we settle at $12,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. That's the highest I'm willing to go.
